documentation.description: Simulate matching the given index name against the index templates in the system

name.description: The name of the index (it must be a concrete index name)

create.description: Whether the index template we optionally defined in the body should only be dry-run added if new or can also replace an existing one

cause.description: User defined reason for dry-run creating the new template for simulation purposes

master_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to master

body.description: New index template definition, which will be included in the simulation, as if it already exists in the system
